nodes.name: approveAndTransfer

approveAndTransfer(uint256,uint256).details: bounty owner approves the submission and transfers reward amount to submittor

params._bountyId: - bounty id of bounty in question
params._submissionId: - submission id of winning submission to be rewarded

params._reward: - bounty reward issue by bounty creator/owner to successful submittors

createBountySubmission(uint256,string).details: create new submission for a bounty

params._bountyId: - submission is created for this bounty
params._text: - response created by the submittor for the bounty task

getBountyById(uint256).details: retrieve bounty with a bounty owners id
getBountyById(uint256).return: title, description, bounty reward, owner address and approval state of Bounty retrieved by bounty id

getBountyByOwnerAddress(address).details: retrieve bounty with a bounty owners address
getBountyByOwnerAddress(address).return: array of bountyId's associated with address for all bounties created byt this owner

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

retrieveSubmissionsIds(uint256).details: retrieve submissions objects with submission ids, once they have been submitted

params._bountyId: - submissions are retrieved for this bounty

retrieveSubmissionsIds(uint256).return: a list of submissionId's linked to the bounty

retrieveSubmissionsTextandAddressFromIds.details: retrieve the text and submittor address of a submission with a submission id

params._submissionId: - submissions id to retrieve submission text and submittor address

retrieveSubmissionsTextandAddressFromIds.return: text and submittor ddress of submission

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
